title: System Migration (com.apple.systemmigration)
description: The payload that configures system migration.

Context.title: Context
Context.description: The context that custom paths apply to.

SourcePath.title: Source Path
SourcePath.description: The path to the migrating file or directory on the source system.

SourcePathInUserHome.title: Source Path In User Home
SourcePathInUserHome.description: If 'true', the source path is located within a user home directory.

TargetPath.title: Target Path
TargetPath.description: The path to the destination file or directory on the target system.

TargetPathInUserHome.title: Target Path In User Home
TargetPathInUserHome.description: If 'true', the target path is located within a user home directory.

Paths.title: Paths
Paths.description: The list of custom behavior path dictionaries.

CustomBehavior.title: Custom Paths
CustomBehavior.description: The list of custom behavior dictionaries.
